tool.name: PhosphoScoring
tool.description: Scores potential phosphorylation sites in order to localize the most probable sites.
tool.command:
PhosphoScoring
#if $param_in: -in $param_in #end if #if $param_id: -id $param_id #end if #if $param_out: -out $param_out #end if #if $param_fragment_mass_tolerance: -fragment_mass_tolerance $param_fragment_mass_tolerance #end if #if $param_fragment_mass_unit: -fragment_mass_unit $param_fragment_mass_unit #end if #if $param_max_peptide_length: -max_peptide_length $param_max_peptide_length #end if #if $param_max_num_perm: -max_num_perm $param_max_num_perm #end if #if $param_threads: -threads $param_threads #end if #if $adv_opts.adv_opts_selector=='advanced': #if $adv_opts.param_version: -version "$adv_opts.param_version" #end if #if $adv_opts.param_log: -log "$adv_opts.param_log" #end if #if $adv_opts.param_debug: -debug $adv_opts.param_debug #end if #if $adv_opts.param_no_progress: -no_progress #end if #if $adv_opts.param_force: -force #end if #if $adv_opts.param_test: -test #end if #end if

param.name: param_id
param.label: Identification input file which contains a search against a concatenated sequence database

param.name: param_max_peptide_length
param.label: Restrict scoring to peptides with a length shorter than this value

param.name: param_max_num_perm
param.label: Maximum number of permutations a sequence can have

param.name: param_threads
param.label: Sets the number of threads allowed to be used by the TOPP tool

param.name: param_version
param.label: Version of the tool that generated this parameters file

param.name: param_log
param.label: Name of log file (created only when specified)

param.name: param_no_progress
param.label: Disables progress logging to command line

param.name: param_test
param.label: Enables the test mode (needed for internal use only)

tool.help:
Scores potential phosphorylation sites in order to localize the most probable sites.
For more information, visit http://ftp.mi.fu-berlin.de/OpenMS/release-documentation/html/TOPP_PhosphoScoring.html
